name: Rukh Egg
text: When Rukh Egg dies, put a 4/4 red Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: Called "stonefeathers" by many lowlanders, rukhs are thought to descend from a phoenix that sacrificed its flame for a body of stone.

name: Ass Whuppin'
text: Destroy target silver-bordered permanent in any game you can see from your seat.

name: Budoka Pupil
text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Budoka Pupil.\nAt the beginning of the end step, if there are two or more ki counters on Budoka Pupil, you may flip it.

name: Ichiga, Who Topples Oaks
text: Trample\nRemove a ki counter from Ichiga, Who Topples Oaks: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Ghost-Lit Raider
text: {2}{R}, {T}: Ghost-Lit Raider deals 2 damage to target creature.\nChannel — {3}{R}, Discard Ghost-Lit Raider: Ghost-Lit Raider deals 4 damage to target creature.

name: Force of Nature
text: Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, Force of Nature deals 8 damage to you unless you pay {G}{G}{G}{G}.

name: Shivan Dragon
text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\n{R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: The undisputed master of the mountains of Shiv.

name: Dimir Guildmage
text: ({U/B} can be paid with either {U} or {B}.)\n{3}{U}: Target player draws a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.\n{3}{B}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: Gruul Guildmage
text: ({R/G} can be paid with either {R} or {G}.)\n{3}{R}, Sacrifice a land: Gruul Guildmage deals 2 damage to target player.\n{3}{G}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Azorius Guildmage
text: {2}{W}: Tap target creature.\n{2}{U}: Counter target activated ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

name: Sudden Shock
text: Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)\nSudden Shock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: Arc mages aren't known for their patience.

name: Hedge Troll
text: Hedge Troll gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains.\n{W}: Regenerate Hedge Troll.
flavor: His abode was clean and bare, not a morsel in sight. I asked him what he ate, fearing the answer. He smiled and said his faith alone sustained him.

name: Storm Entity
text: Haste\nStorm Entity enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other spell cast this turn.
flavor: Dweldian magi don't enter the Realm of Thrones when they die. Instead their souls are drawn to great works of magic.

name: Shriekmaw
text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)\nWhen Shriekmaw enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature.\nEvoke {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)
